column5: Hi, awhile ago someone posted a link to a site that had realtime water depth charts for lakes and rivers. It would be greatly appreciated if someone could post it again or pm me the info.  thanks  bbnotty
Thanks, my computer crashed last week and I lost all my saved sites. this is greatly appreciated.  bbnotty
that is really a great site.  thanks for the link
this is awesome!!!!! thanks alot!  I can't believe how many lakes/creeks/rivers they have data for! cool!  happy holidays! UF
